content:
This article or section contains information about a scheduled future release or update.
As such, the information is subject to change. This article should consist only of facts included in official Jagex releases and not speculation.
Remember: The Old School RuneScape Wiki is not a crystal ball.
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Dealing with Scabaras
Beneath Cursed Sands (#153)
Please add an image!
Released 27 April 2022 - Update Unknown (edit)
Members Yes
Quest series Kharidian
Official difficulty Master
Lead developer(s) Mod Ed

Beneath Cursed Sands is an upcoming quest first announced during the Summer Summit in 2021, and is scheduled for release in April 2022. The quest is a continuation of the Desert quest series.

Contents

  • 1 Details
  • 2 Rewards
  • 3 Developers
  • 4 Trivia

Details[edit | edit source]

Start point Speak to Jamila in Sophanem.
Official difficultyMaster
DescriptionWhen Sophanem was beset by a series of plagues, the gates to the golden city of Menaphos quickly closed. The city has been locked down ever since, with no one allowed to leave or enter. However, rumours have escaped of strange happenings inside Menaphos and there are stories of citizens mysteriously disappearing. These odd happenings need to be investigated, but few are willing to do so. Maisa, a spy from Al Kharid, has grown tired of inaction. She is determined to solve this mystery herself, but she won't be able to do it alone...
Official lengthLong
Requirements
  • Completion of the following quests:
    • Contact!
      • Prince Ali Rescue
      • Icthlarin's Little Helper
        • Gertrude's Cat
  • 62 Agility (unknown)
  • 55 Crafting (unknown)
  • 55 Firemaking (unknown)
Items required None
Recommended
  • 80
Enemies to defeat None

The city has been locked down ever since, with no one allowed to leave or enter. However, rumours have escaped of strange happenings inside Menaphos and there are stories of citizens mysteriously disappearing. These odd happenings need to be investigated, but few are willing to do so. Maisa, a spy from Al Kharid, has grown tired of inaction. She is determined to solve this mystery herself, but she won't be able to do it alone...","difficulty":"Master","kills":"","name":"Beneath Cursed Sands","start":"Speak to [[Jamila]] in [[Sophanem]].","length":"Long","items":""}

Rewards[edit | edit source]

File:Beneath Cursed Sands reward scroll.png
  • 2 Quest points
  • 20,000 Agility experience
  • Access to the Tombs of Amascut
  • The ability to upgrade the Keris to the Keris partisan

Developers[edit | edit source]

  • Main developer(s): Mod Ed

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The RuneScape equivalent to this quest in the Desert storyline is Dealing with Scabaras, released on 2 January 2008.

'''Beneath Cursed Sands''' is an [[Upcoming updates|upcoming]] [[quest]] first announced during the Summer Summit in 2021, and is scheduled for release in April 2022. The quest is a continuation of the [[Quests/Series#Desert series|Desert quest series]].

==Details==
{{Quest details
|start = Speak to [[Jamila]] in [[Sophanem]].
|difficulty = Master
|description = When Sophanem was beset by a series of plagues, the gates to the golden city of Menaphos quickly closed. The city has been locked down ever since, with no one allowed to leave or enter. However, rumours have escaped of strange happenings inside Menaphos and there are stories of citizens mysteriously disappearing. These odd happenings need to be investigated, but few are willing to do so. Maisa, a spy from Al Kharid, has grown tired of inaction. She is determined to solve this mystery herself, but she won't be able to do it alone...
|length = Long
|requirements =

**[[Contact!]]
